Text:
Works like a charm, wonder why they didn't release it when it was supposed to... a bit short, finished it in about 1h, but worth playing. Nothing to do now but wait for "Awakening" in March, I suppose.

Good upload, virus free, good speed. Got it in less than 3 minutes. Thanks!
True enough, I was referring to the Dragon Age universe though. Mass Effect 2 should be good alright.

@Seederr_: great job! but could you please update the DCL? If this DCL was uploaded on Jan 12 then it's the version that'd been pulled off by BioWare due to bugs. An updated Ostagar was re-released only now (Jan 31 or Feb 01).
